response.overview: In the seventy-first year of the last century two bureaucrats lived in Moldova: the First and Second Secretary of the Communist Party. The Second Secretary was more important than the First, since he befriended the Tsar of the whole Soviet Union - Leonid Brezhnev. The Moldovan Republic prepares for a visit from Brezhnev when Lautar finally asks the gypsy Baron for his daughters hand in marriage.
response.title: Rabbit Over the Void
